name: CreateEnvironmentDashboardFromTemplate
description:
Create an environment dashboard from a template.

Use this tool to create a new environment dashboard in Datadog by applying a template JSON. This is useful for quickly setting up dashboards in specified projects.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The Project ID for the target environment in Datadog. Retrieve this ID via the /api/projects/ API call.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.description: Specifies the format of the response. Choose between 'json' or 'txt'.

parameters.name: dashboard_template_json
parameters.description: A JSON object detailing the dashboard to create using the template, including properties like id, name, description, and other optional settings.

user_access_level.description: The effective access level the user has for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

user_access_level.description: The effective access level the user has for this object
